response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. Given its quality and craftsmanship, I think it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering its exceptional attributes, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This offer includes a limited-time warranty and free shipping. Would you like to make this purchase today?", "product_price": 150}
